summary.name: summary
summary.value: Fix syntax errors in inline docs

description.name: description
description.value:
There are numerous syntax errors in the Zend_Gdata inline documentation that need to be fixed. These errors are reproduced below:

{quote}WARNING in Email.php on line 35: no @package tag was used in a DocBlock for class Zend_Gdata_App_Extension_Email

WARNING in Extension.php on line 27: no @package tag was used in a DocBlock for class Zend_Gdata_App_Extension

WARNING in AuthSub.php on line 23: Page-level DocBlock precedes "require_once 'Zend/Http/Client.php'", use another DocBlock to document the source element

WARNING in ClientLogin.php on line 23: Page-level DocBlock precedes "require_once 'Zend/Http/Client.php'", use another DocBlock to document the source element

ERROR in UserEntry.php on line 237: DocBlock has multiple @return tags, illegal. ignoring additional tag "@return Zend_Gdata_Gapps_Extension_Quota The requested object."

ERROR in Gapps.php on line 313: DocBlock has multiple @return tags, illegal. ignoring additional tag "@return Zend_Gdata_App_Feed "

ERROR in Gapps.php on line 336: DocBlock has multiple @return tags, illegal. ignoring additional tag "@return Zend_Gdata_App_Feed "

ERROR in Gapps.php on line 360: DocBlock has multiple @return tags, illegal. ignoring additional tag "@return Zend_Gdata_App_Feed "

ERROR in Gapps.php on line 383: DocBlock has multiple @return tags, illegal. ignoring additional tag "@return Zend_Gdata_App_Feed "

value.name: Zend_Gdata
value.description: Class interface to Google Data API's.

value.body: Fixed in my build, patch sent to rboyd for review.
Updating Fix Version to follow issue tracker conventions.
